topicv3: Economic Growth m1326241 471,Economic Growth Policy m1327634 1070,Competition Policy and Growth m1326469 1080,Sustainable Growth m1326464 1100,Fiscal Sustainability m1326901 1097

abstracts.cdata!:
Facing the need for a sustainable growth
            strategy, Moldova has been working with the International
            Development Association (IDA) to address its main
            development challenges through increased economic
            competitiveness, promotion of human development and social
            inclusion, and increased effectiveness of the public sector.
